title: (x) The Neverending Story - Serif font on a 1984 movie prop book - Baskerville {Rainer}
author: Font-A-Saurus

comments.content: Pretty similar indeed. However, the top serif of the ‘E’ seems to be straight, and the ‘S’ doesn’t look as top-heavy as in Caslon 540. Hard to tell at that angle.

Here's one with a corrected angle:  
 [http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8249/neverendingstory.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075613/http:/img192.imageshack.us/img192/8249/neverendingstory.png "http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8249/neverendingstory.png")  
not perfect, but it may help..
Looks like one of the thousand Baskervilles.
